name: Scarf No Chill
description:
Your goal is to craft the most valuable scarf

D A / Right Left      : movemont

Space                           : jump

S / Down                    : scarf cover

E / I                                : open crafting inventory

Esc                                 : pause button

Becarful! a chilling storm is heading oyur way! Use your scarf to cover yourself from the cold by holding the "scarf cover" button.

Filnd all 4 resource spawners in the game and collect all their good's.

On your crafting menu you may craft Fire sources, Faster boots, Next-gen scarfs or Upgrade your resource spawners, just check you have the required score for crafting them. 

Upgrading your scarf will give you many points and make you closer to victory. On the other hand, it will make your resistance to cold worse.
